text: "Losing Grip" is a 2003 single by Avril Lavigne. It is the fourth single from her first studio album Let Go. On the Billboard charts, Losing Grip peaked at #17 on the Mainstream Top 40, #33 on the Adult Top 40, and at #64 on the Hot 100 charts. At the 2004 Grammy Awards, Losing Grip was nominated for Best Female Rock Vocal Performance. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2003 songs Category:Avril Lavigne songs
title: Losing Grip
